sentence: Israel  continues  to  escalate  its  assault  in  Gaza  as  a  response  to  the  Hamas  attack  on  Oct.  7  that  killed  almost  1,200  people  and  saw  some  250  others  taken  hostage.
Gaza's  health  ministry  has  reported  that  the  number  of  Palestinians  killed  has  topped  25,000.
